class_notes: Online with some synchronous sessions. 1-hour synchronous sessions with faculty and EBP project group during the weeks of TBD; times TBD.
course_description: Principles of evidence based practice and the skills for formulating meaningful clinical questions, locating the best evidence, critically evaluating research and other types of evidence, and formulating and applying evidence-based recommendations to practice and policy decisions are discussed.
